title: Can McLaren keep the peace? - What to watch out for in the US GP
summary: The title fight heats up in Austin as McLaren's internal rivalry, Verstappen's resurgence, Russell's momentum and a sprint weekend promise a dramatic United States Grand Prix

qa_pairs.question: Which team is experiencing an internal rivalry that could impact their performance at the US Grand Prix?
What type of weekend format is expected at the United States Grand Prix, which adds to the excitement of the event?
Who is noted for their resurgence heading into the US Grand Prix, potentially affecting the championship battle?
